Name: Stealth Battlesuits
Unit_Composition: 1 Stealth Shas'vre;2-5 Stealth Shas'ui;Every Model is equipped with: burst cannon, battlesuit fists

Abilities.Forward Observers: Each time this unit is an Observer Unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in their Guided Unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a hit roll of 1 and re-roll a wound roll of 1.

Wargear_Abilities.Battlesuit Support System: The bearer's unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.
Wargear_Abilities.Homing Beacon: Once per battle, you can use the rapid ingress Stratagem for 0CP. The target must be set up within 3 inches of the bearer's unit and not wihin 9 inches of any enemy units.;Designer's Note: Place a Homing Beacon token next to this unit, removing it once this ablility is used.

Wargear_Options.0: The Stealth Shas'vre can be equipped with up to two of the following, and can take duplicates:;1 gun drone*;1 marker drone*;1 shield drone*;
Wargear_Options.1: For every 3 models in the unit, 1 model's burst cannon can be replaced with 1 fusion blaster.
Wargear_Options.2: For every 3 models in the unit, 1 model can be equipped with 1 battlesuit support system.
